rev.comment: minor word fix: "Bitcoins" --> "Bitcoin" (I think this is more "correct", but please revert if I am wrong)
rev.diff:
Line 161: Line 161:
===Legality===
===Legality===
â
US Senators have issued talks with the Justice Department on possible regulation regarding BitCoins and their legality especially regarding their use in "black market" transactions. The fringe group 'LulzSec' openly admits to accepting donations in Bitcoin, that the group "needs bitcoin donations to continue their hacking efforts" further underlining the tenuous legality of Bitcoin and it's supporters. <ref>http://news.cnet.com/8301-13506_3-20070268-17/senators-target-bitcoin-currency-citing-drug-sales/</ref>
+
US Senators have issued talks with the Justice Department on possible regulation regarding BitCoin and its legality especially regarding their use in "black market" transactions. The fringe group 'LulzSec' openly admits to accepting donations in Bitcoin, that the group "needs bitcoin donations to continue their hacking efforts" further underlining the tenuous legality of Bitcoin and it's supporters. <ref>http://news.cnet.com/8301-13506_3-20070268-17/senators-target-bitcoin-currency-citing-drug-sales/</ref>
